sentences.english: If the Hongkong-Zhuhai-Macau Bridge is built, the economy of the Pan-Pearl River Delta will grow much more rapidly.

sentences.english: Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge is the world's longest crossing Sea Bridge.
